verses.roman:
tabe haricandana āsi' jānāre kahila
cāṅge haite gopīnāthe śīghra nāmāila

synonyms: tabe—at that time; haricandana—Haricandana Pātra; āsi'-coming; jānāre kahila—informed the prince; cāṅge haite—from the cāṅga platform; gopīnāthe—Gopīnātha; śīghra—very soon; nāmāila—took down.
translation: Haricandana then returned and informed the prince of the King's desire, and immediately Gopīnātha Paṭṭanāyaka was taken down from the cāṅga.
